show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: The Global Warming Boondoggle
content:
We examine whether the enormous resources given over to this really represent the best way in which we can defend... <!--more--> society against unknown future disasters.
I name some of them.
A record number of e-mails pertaining to one of my show themes were received during the show today over this.
More on General Motors regrettable use of subprime loans to sell its cars.
An update on the Obamacare rollout.
An update on the budget crisis.
Why does the public sign on for all the nonsense about a fantasy “economic recovery”?
The horror of 440,000 Americans killed each year by preventable hospital errors.
Britain’s public equally uncritical towards the extinction of their freedoms.
A comparison between the second US central bank and the third (‘The Federal Reserve’, itself a deceptive and deceitful title).
